hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Install dependencies sudo zypper update -y sudo zypper install -y wget tar curl
export WORK_DIR=`pwd`
# INstall latest ibm sdk cd $WORK_DIR wget http://public.dhe.ibm.com/ibmdl/export/pub/systems/cloud/runtimes/java/8.0.5.10/linux/s390x/ibm-java-s390x-sdk-8.0-5.10.bin wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zos-spark/scala-workbench/master/files/installer.properties.java tail -n +3 installer.properties.java | tee installer.properties cat installer.properties chmod +x ibm-java-s390x-sdk-8.0-5.10.bin sudo ./ibm-java-s390x-sdk-8.0-5.10.bin -r installer.properties export JAVA_HOME=/opt/ibm/java export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version
#Install Node.js cd $WORK_DIR #wget http://public.dhe.ibm.com/ibmdl/export/pub/systems/cloud/runtimes/nodejs/6.10.3.0/linux/s390x/ibm-6.10.3.0-node-v6.10.3-linux-s390x.bin wget http://public.dhe.ibm.com/ibmdl/export/pub/systems/cloud/runtimes/nodejs/6.12.2.0/linux/s390x/ibm-6.12.2.0-node-v6.12.2-linux-s390x.bin chmod +x ibm-6.12.2.0-node-v6.12.2-linux-s390x.bin echo -e "LICENSE_ACCEPTED=TRUE\nUSER_INSTALL_DIR=$WORK_DIR/ibm/node\n-fileOverwrite_$WORK_DIR/ibm/node/_node_installation/uninstall.lax=Yes" > installer.properties cat installer.properties ./ibm-6.12.2.0-node-v6.12.2-linux-s390x.bin -f installer.properties -i silent
export PATH=$PATH:$WORK_DIR/ibm/node/bin node -v
#Get Kibana release package and extract cd $WORK_DIR wget https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/kibana/kibana-6.2.2-linux-x86_64.tar.gz tar xvf kibana-6.2.2-linux-x86_64.tar.gz
#Replace Node.js in the package with the installed IBM SDK for Node.js. cd kibana-6.2.2-linux-x86_64 mv node node_old ln -s $WORK_DIR/ibm/node node
# Start Kibana
cd $WORK_DIR wget https://artifacts.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch/elasticsearch-6.2.2.tar.gz tar -xvf elasticsearch-6.2.2.tar.gz ls nohup elasticsearch-6.2.2/bin/elasticsearch & sleep 2m
cd $WORK_DIR/kibana-6.2.2-linux-x86_64 bin/kibana -H 0.0.0.0 & sleep 2m
curl http://localhost:5601
pgrep -d" " -f "node" | xargs kill; pgrep -d" " -f "elasticsearch" | xargs kill;
